name: WC Dream
description:
P.S. From the developer:
Hi. This game will take you back to childhood and make you the King of your imagination. You can build anything your imagination comes up with using basic items. There are no limits. I've tried to make it very simple and understandable for everyone. Enjoy the game, King. 🏰

Welcome to the exciting game "WC Dream"✨! Here, every KING becomes a true architect of their own kingdom, where the only limitation is their imagination.

You are the KING of your own throne, capable of creating anything you desire. Start by building your dream castle - a castle that embodies your wildest fantasies. Build it however you envision - the sky's the limit.

Your throne will be a unique masterpiece of architecture. Create a throne that reflects your power and majesty. Sit upon it and enjoy the breathtaking view of your kingdom.


Throughout the game, you will collect crowns to unlock new thrones and build anything the KING desires from basic materials.
Game Features:

There are 4 types of materials available: Water, Cement, Wood, Stone.
Collect crowns to unlock Thrones.
Explore the first level with stunning landscapes.

Future Plans:
Introduce new materials and shapes.
Work on many new landscapes for construction: Mars, Winter, Caves, Forests, Space...

Get ready for an exhilarating adventure in "WC Dream"! Build, create, and rule your kingdom with immense satisfaction!
YOU are the KING!
